description: Follow-up experiments to test reuse, helper discovery, step budgets, and file-first outputs.

experiments.title: Endpoint JSON (baseline)
experiments.prompt: Please produce a concise JSON list of all HTTP endpoints this service exposes, with method and a short description. Save the full JSON to a file so it can be refreshed later.

experiments.title: Endpoint JSON (refresh, minimal effort)
experiments.prompt: Please refresh that endpoint JSON list and return it again, minimizing effort and time. Reuse any helpers or files you already created if possible.

experiments.title: JSON update task
experiments.prompt: Please create or update a file named report.json that includes: current date, total number of Go files, and total number of TypeScript files in this repo. Give me a short summary after.

experiments.title: Step budget constraint
experiments.prompt: Please list the five largest Go files by line count. You may use at most 3 exec calls total.

experiments.title: File-first output
experiments.prompt: Please list all files over 300 lines in this project. Put the full list in a file and give me a short summary with the top 5.
